title: Riot toke my RP... LIKE WTF
body:
okay if you have seen the title you make know what im talking about [Riot toke my Rp] okay it started one day i brought some rp at bought some skins and so on and had about 932 rp left  but i wanted a skin that costed 972 and i dident buy more rp but some weeks later i brought some rp and played some guys with my friend i had bought for the 1350 rp so i have 2228 rp and i bought a Ryze skin for 972... the [Crystal ryze skin] and i had more left but i dident use it some days later the Riot kayle event came and i looked for i had gotten the riot kayle skin that day but i dident. 2 days later i looked again and i had it BUT i have only about 552 rp now LIKE WTF and i want my rp back i know if this havent happen for you may not care but think if it would happen to you to would most likely be in the samespot like me so riot give me my rp back pls..... oh and the last buy i had was [Ryze Crystal skin Costed 972]
so Give me my rp back pls...... have a good day if you can..

replies.body: It sounds strange that RP would just disappear so I looked into this for you.  I do see that you purchased Dark Crystal Ryze, but on the day you purchased RP you also used it to obtain Kled for 975 RP.  Hopefully, this helps clear things up!
